Here are some handy links that you may find useful

Show details on sender: http://localhost:3000/observer/show_user/5
Make Sender an Author: http://localhost:3000/name/review_authors/2?add=5

If you feel the sender of this mail is abusing this service please forward this entire message to: webmaster@mushroomobserver.org
